price: Sε Yamma wo anyina pintinn a, anka wobεdane wo ho ama wͻn kakra.
arabic: وَلَوۡلَآ أَن ثَبَّتۡنَٰكَ لَقَدۡ كِدتَّ تَرۡكَنُ إِلَيۡهِمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا قَلِيلًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walawlā an thabbatnāka laqad kidtta tarkanu ilayhim shayan qalīlan
